wikipedia_page.main: Colin John Duncan (born 5 August 1957) is an English former association footballer who as a midfielder. Born in Plymstock, he played for Reading, Oxford United, Gillingham and Aldershot in a twelve-year professional career. He subsequently played non-league football for Fleet Town and Basingstoke Town. After retiring from football, Duncan settled in Thatcham where he became a painter-decorator.
